title: New: Crying – Bodega Run
content:
Let’s get this straight from the start, this might not be your cup of tea, in fact, I’d put money on 50% of people turning it off before it hits the fifteen second mark.

Opening with a chiptune wail equivalent to that of an angry wasp, it’s pop music from the year 2025, and in truth, I’m yet to decide whether I’m digging it, all I know is that it’s undeniably interesting. Check out Bodega Run by Crying below, and show your friends how sensitive you are by liking Crying on Facebook.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
